content: What 2006 film, directed by Martin Scorsese, is a remake of the 2002 Hong Kong film "Infernal Affairs"?

The 2006 film directed by Martin Scorsese that is a remake of the 2002 Hong Kong film "Infernal Affairs" is "The Departed." This movie stars Leonardo DiCaprio, Matt Damon, Jack Nicholson, and Mark Wahlberg, among others. It was critically acclaimed and won several awards, including four Academy Awards: Best Picture, Best Director for Scorsese, Best Adapted Screenplay, and Best Film Editing.
